alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 16 at 9:06AM EST until January 16 at 9:30AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Glades County in southern Florida... * Until 930 AM EST. * At 906 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles northwest of Muse, or 13 miles northwest of Labelle, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Glades County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
